titleStmt.title: Six sermons delivered in the lecture at Kettering in the countie of Northampton, and in certain other places. By John Fosbroke ...
titleStmt.author: Fosbroke, John.

titleStmt.title: Six sermons delivered in the lecture at Kettering in the countie of Northampton, and in certain other places. By John Fosbroke ...
titleStmt.author: Fosbroke, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the printers to the Vniversitie of Cambridge,

notesStmt.note: Contents: [1] "Anthrōpodaimōnomachia· or The vvarre or conflict between man and the Devil", B3-G4 (last leaf blank); [2] "Solomons charitie", ² A-² D2; [3] "Daimōnopanōlethria: or The Devils down-fall", ² D3-³C2 (last leaf blank); [4] "Englands vvarning by Israel and Judah", ³C3-⁴G3; [5] "The Christian race", ⁴G4-⁵D2; [6] "Hagiosymposion: or A direction for the right manner of feasting", ⁶A1-⁶D2. Each has separate dated title page, pagination, and register (though the sub-title page generally belongs to the preceding register).

Part 1 identified as STC 669 on UMI microfilm reel 1194; parts 1-3 identified as STC 669, 22903, and 6189 on reel 1370; part 5 identified as STC 5151a on reel 1267; and part 6 identified as STC 12601 on reel 578.
Reproductions of the originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery, the Bodleian Library, and the Folger Shakespeare Library.

Appears at reel 1023 (Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery copy, complete); at reel 1370 (Bodleian Library copy, parts 1-3); at reel 1194 (duplicate filming of Bodleian Library part 1); at reel 1267 (Bodleian Library copy, part 5, lacking title page); and at reel 578 (Folger Shakespeare Library copy, part 6).

person.persName: the printers to the Vniversitie of Cambridge
